TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CalendarDay extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 控件中的日期。

span.span: Represents a date in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象表示控件中的日期 。A object represents a date in the control. 在事件处理程序中，可以使用此类 以编程方式访问在控件上呈现的日期属性 。You can use this class in the event handler to programmatically access the properties of a date as it is rendered on the control. 这允许您确定一天 (的属性，例如日期是可选、选择、今天的日期还是周末) 并以编程方式控制当天的外观或行为。This allows you to determine the properties of the day (such as whether the date is selectable, selected, today's date, or a weekend date) and programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象的属性 来确定事件中所呈现的日期 是否处于显示的月份，而不是在星期六或星期日。The following example demonstrates how to use the properties of a object to determine whether the date being rendered in the event is in the displayed month and do not fall on Saturday or Sunday. 这些日期显示为黄色。These dates are displayed in yellow. 请注意， 传递到事件处理程序的对象的属性 是 对象。Note that the property of the object passed into the event handler is the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CalendarDay Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CalendarDay Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CalendarDay Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CalendarDay Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarDayRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarDayRender/CS/calendardayrendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarDayRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarDayRender/VB/calendardayrendervb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 日历 Web 服务器控件

span.span: Calendar Web Server Control

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 尽管此构造函数可用，但 通常不会动态创建类的实例。Although this constructor is available, an instance of the class is not typically created dynamically. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |DateDate|`date` 参数的值。The value of the `date` parameter.| |DayNumberTextDayNumberText|`dayNumberText` 参数的值。The value of the `dayNumberText` parameter.| |IsOtherMonthIsOtherMonth|`isOtherMonth` 参数的值。The value of the `isOtherMonth` parameter.| |IsSelectedIsSelected|`isSelected` 参数的值。The value of the `isSelected` parameter.| |IsTodayIsToday|`isToday` 参数的值。The value of the `isToday` parameter.| |IsWeekendIsWeekend|`isWeekEnd` 参数的值。The value of the `isWeekEnd` parameter.|

summary.span: 获取由此类的实例表示的日期。

This property is read-only.

value.span: 一个 对象，它包含该类实例所表示的日期。

span.span: A object that contains the date represented by an instance of this class.

value.span: 这使您可以基于该值以编程方式控制日期的外观或行为。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性以编程方式确定此类的实例所表示的日期。Use the property to programmatically determine the date represented by an instance of this class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来比较事件中呈现的日期 和当天日期。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to compare the date being rendered in the event with today's date. 如果日期是今天的日期，则它显示在控件上带有红色文本的黄色单元格中 。If the date is today's date, it is displayed in a yellow cell with red text on the control. span.span: The string equivalent of the day number for the date represented by an instance of this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定此类的实例所表示日期的日期的等效字符串。Use the property to determine the string equivalent of the day number for the date represented by an instance of this class. 这使您可以基于该值以编程方式控制日期的外观或行为。This allows you to programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day, based on this value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来显示控件上的所选日期编号 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to display the selected day number on the control. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示由此类的实例表示的日期是否属于除 控件中显示的月份之外的月份。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the date represented by an instance of this class is in a month other than the month displayed in the control.
This property is read-only.

value.span: 如果由此类的实例表示的日期属于除 控件中显示的月份之外的月份，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the date represented by an instance of this class is in a month other than the month displayed in the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性以编程方式确定此类的实例所表示的日期是否在控件中显示的月份之外的月份 。Use the property to programmatically determine whether the date represented by an instance of this class is in a month other than the month displayed in the control. 这使您可以基于此值以编程方式控制日的外观或行为。This allows you to programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day based on this value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象的属性 来确定事件中呈现的日期 是否在显示的月份中，并且不是星期六或星期日。The following example demonstrates how to use the properties of a object to determine whether the date being rendered in the event is in the displayed month and are not either a Saturday or a Sunday. 这些日期显示为黄色。These dates are displayed in yellow. 请注意， 传递到事件处理程序的对象的属性 是 对象。Note that the property of the object passed into the event handler is the object. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示由此类的实例表示的日期是否可以在 控件中被选定。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the date represented by an instance of this class can be selected in the control.

value.span: 如果该日期可以被选定，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the date can be selected; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定或确定是否可以在控件中选择此类的实例所表示的日期 。Use the property to specify or determine whether the date represented by an instance of this class can be selected in the control. 这使您可以基于此值以编程方式控制日的外观行为。This allows you to programmatically control the appearance behavior of the day, based on this value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来禁止在控件上选择当前日期 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to disable the ability to select the current date on the control. 请注意， 传递到事件处理程序的对象的属性 是 对象。Note that the property of the object passed into the event handler is the object. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示由此类的实例表示的日期是否与 控件的 属性所指定的日期相同。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the date represented by an instance of this class is the same date specified by the property of the control.
This property is read-only.

value.span: 如果由此类的实例表示的日期与由 控件的 属性指定的日期相同，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the date represented by an instance of this class is the same date specified by the property of the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性以编程方式确定此类的实例所表示的日期是否与控件的属性指定的日期相同 。Use the property to programmatically determine whether the date represented by an instance of this class is the same date specified by the property of the control. 这使您可以基于该值以编程方式控制日期的外观或行为。This allows you to programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day, based on this value. > [!NOTE] > 尽管属性指定的日期 通常是服务器上的系统日期，但如果需要，可以对其进行更改。Although the date specified by the property is usually the system date on the server, it is possible to change it, if necessary. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来确定事件中呈现的日期 是否为当前日期。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine if the date being rendered in the event is the current date. 如果日期是当前日期，则它显示在上带有红色文本的黄色单元格中 。If the date is the current date, it is displayed in a yellow cell with red text on the . 请注意， 传递到事件处理程序的对象的属性 是 对象。Note that the property of the object passed into the event handler is the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CalendarDay.IsToday Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CalendarDay.IsToday Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CalendarDay.IsToday Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CalendarDay.IsToday Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
